name: Shred Off
description:
This Game Is Still In Development

In this 3rd-person action snowboarding shooter, you perform Stylish tricks in the deserted Alaskan mountains while gunning down enemies with an arsenal of ranged weaponry. Shred down the mountains on your snowboard to get a high score while competing against your friends! 

FAST-PACED ARCADE ACTION

High-octane action with fast-paced gameplay - Shred down the Alaskan mountains while bullets, explosions, and even lightning fly past you as you do tricks. Every flashy action rewards you with points as you make your way downhill.

Snowboarding with GUNS

As you are doing tricks in the air and carving snow on the ground, engage in combat with 4 different enemies looking to stop you in any way possible. Shoot at them with your trusty revolver or any of the special pickup weapons found in the level.
